string.value: You delivered the letter to #b#p1012003##k. Listen to his response.

Chief Stan says that the town really needs meat and asks that you bring him mushrooms, which will have to do for now. Bring Chief Stan lots of mushrooms.\r\n\r\n#i4000001# #t4000001# #b#c4000001# / 20#k
After receiving the mushrooms, Chief Stan thanks you and tells you to feel free about asking him for anything. You really don't have anything to request of him at the moment, though.
Delayed delivery of the #t4032453#? We really need meat in Henesys, but I guess we'll just have to survive on mushrooms for a while... \r\n#b#L0#Is there anything I can help you with?#l\n#k
Oh, you're still here, Evan? Well, if you can, do you think you can bring me #b20 #t4000001#s#k?
Oh, you can? #r#o1210102#s#k can be found easily in #b#m104040001##k or #bIII#k. They can also be found at the #b#m100010100# near #m100000000##k. Thanks.
By the way, that lizard... Nevermind. Kids these days have such strange pets... I'd rather act like I didn't see anything.
It's probably too difficult for you. What should I do... Should I just ask another adventurer passing through?
Oh wow, you've brought the 20 #t4000001#s that I asked for! That's pretty good. #p1013103# must be teaching you hunting skills too! This is great. Thank you.
If there is anything I can ever do for you, please let me know. If there is something I can help you with in #m100000000#, I will do my best to assist you.
You couldn't get #b20 #t4000001#s#k yet? There are so many #r#o1210102#s#k around #m100000000#. Although I have noticed that they have become stronger these days...
